member.name: EXP_SZ_LINK
member.summary: Holds an extra data block used by . It holds expandable environment strings for the icon or target.

member.name: EXP_SZ_LINK.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the EXP_SZ_LINK structure.

summary.para: The structure's signature. It can have one of the following values.

member.name: EXP_SZ_LINK.szTarget
member.summary: The null-terminated ANSI string with the path of the target or icon.

member.name: EXP_SZ_LINK.swzTarget
member.summary: The null-terminated Unicode string with the path of the target or icon.
